cl_send_online_desc: Send to online players - stored at post office for retrieval
cl_send_any_desc: Search for any player - letter stored at post office
cl_send_addressbook_desc: Send to saved contacts - stored at post office
cl_search_hint: Enter first name, last name, or citizen ID
cl_claim_letter_desc: This will add the letter to your inventory
cl_burn_confirm_desc: Are you sure you want to destroy this letter? This cannot be undone.
cl_keep_letter_desc: Store the letter in your inventory
cl_letter_kept_desc: The letter remains in your inventory
cl_delete_all_desc: Permanently delete all post office messages
cl_delete_all_confirm_desc: This will delete all {count} messages permanently.
cl_bird_post_bird: Send via bird - immersive delivery directly to player
cl_bird_post_office: Send to saved contacts - stored at post office
cl_bird_cant_find: The bird cannot find you inside. Go outside!
cl_bird_approaching: A bird is approaching with a letter!
cl_wait_for_bird: Wait for the bird to land...
cl_send_confirm_bird: Send this letter via post office The recipient will receive it instantly.
cl_send_confirm_any: Send this letter?If recipient is online, they get it instantlyoffline, they can retrieve it at the post office.
cl_send_confirm_addressbook: Send this letter If recipient is online, they'll get it via bird offline, it will be stored at post office.
cl_send_receiving: You can't write a letter while you're waiting for incoming Bird Post!
cl_delivery_fail1: The bird couldn't deliver the letter
cl_delivery_fail2: The letter will be waiting at the post office
sv_send_to_self: You cannot send a letter to yourself
sv_no_bird_post: You don't have a bird post!
sv_letter_sent_desc: They can retrieve it at any post office
sv_letter_sent_online: is online and was notified. They can retrieve it at any post office
sv_letter_sent_offline: is offline. They can retrieve it at the post office when they log in
sv_inventory_full: Your inventory is full! Letter will be at post office
sv_letter_claimed: The letter has been added to your inventory
sv_recipient_inventory_full: Recipient's inventory full. Letter saved at post office
sv_message_sent_post: Message sent to {name} via post office
sv_post_office_notify: You have a letter waiting at the post office
sv_letter_error_blank: This letter appears to be blank or damaged
sv_check_inventory: Check your inventory to read it
